column2: Daseke, Inc. engages in the provision of transportation and logistics solutions. The company is headquartered in Addison, Texas and currently employs 5,829 full-time employees. The company operates through two segments: Flatbed Solutions and Specialized Solutions. The Flatbed Solutions segment is focused on delivering transportation and logistics solutions that principally require the use of flatbed and retractable-sided transportation equipment. The Company, through its Specialized Solutions segment transports aircraft parts, manufacturing equipment, structural steel, pressure vessels, wind turbine blades, heavy machinery, commercial glass, high security cargo, arms, ammunition and explosives, lumber, and building and construction materials. The company also provides industrial warehousing space. The firm operates a fleet of approximately 6,000 tractors and 13,000 flatbed and specialized trailers.
